extendedInfo.description: Control your LiftMasterÂ® MyQÂ®-enabled garage door opener, gate operator, and house lights from anywhere in the world.  *** Note, you must have a LiftMasterÂ® Internet Gateway and a LiftMaster MyQ account to log into this app.  To sign up for a free LiftMaster MyQ account, see www.myliftmaster.com. ***The LiftMaster MyQ Home Control App is perfect for anyone who has ever left the house and wondered if their garage door or gate was opened or wished they could turn on lights to make it look like they are home while they are away.The LiftMaster Internet Gateway accessory and the LiftMaster MyQ App allow you to monitor and control your LiftMaster MyQ enabled garage door opener, gate operator, and light controls with your Android phone or tablet.  And with push notifications enabled, the device can receive alerts that the garage door is open or a light was left on.-	Monitor and control multiple garage door openers-	Monitor and control multiple gate operators-	Turn on or off lights-	Customize to receive alerts when the garage door, gate or lighting status changed-	Edit account information-	Enhance your security by adding a passcode of your choice-	Modify security levelsRequires a LiftMaster MyQ enabled garage door opener or LiftMaster MyQ Control Panel with a compatible garage door opener or a LiftMaster MyQ enabled gate operator.  In order to control lights, a LiftMaster MyQ light switch or LiftMaster MyQ lamp control is required.  See www.liftmaster.com for additional information. LiftMaster. The Worldâs #1 Professionally Installed Garage Door Opener.

reviews.title: Myq. New update bad.
reviews.comment: It keeps saying garage door open light on door closed light off twice now within 10 minutes. Log reports all 4 events but the icon says garage door closed for 3 horsy
reviews.author: Sue Wilson

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Can open and close my garage door from anywhere. Excellent product
reviews.author: Justin DeBrie

reviews.title: I love it.
reviews.comment: It works nicely on my s4.  I like  lift master products they are always there to help if need any technical assistance...
reviews.author: MOHAMMED MALKANI

reviews.title: Criminal\'s best friend
reviews.comment: An app than opens my garage door, shouldn\'t contain my address. I have my phone pin protected, but that\'s just dumb!
reviews.author: Mike Led

reviews.title: Two Bugs
reviews.comment: I have two garage doors configured.  unable to scroll to the right in order to bring the second door to the center. I can see one eighth of the door and the rest is off the screen. I can still open and close it. But that bug needs to be fixed. You should be able to scroll left and right. The second bug is when I go to another area of the program like settings I cant use the back button on my note 2 to go back a screen. It logs me out and I have to reopen the program and log in again. 5 stars when fixed.
reviews.author: Stephen Wilmes

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Oh this is real nice............good job LiftMaster!
reviews.author: Scott Cochran

reviews.title: Pretty darn good
reviews.comment: Very nice to have the ability to do what the app provides. However, when I close the garage door, I get a notification saying garage is opened? I do not have the closed optioned selected for a notification. Also, as others said, can b very slow on WiFi. 4g is fine. Please fix or advice on this issue. Thx E
reviews.author: Eric Allender

reviews.title: Much better with latest update
reviews.comment: 1 star previously. Last 2 updates and it is much improved and works very well. Recommend.
reviews.author: David Broderick

reviews.title: This App is broken as well as computer service
reviews.comment: LiftMaster/Chamberlain - New App and new Hosting Software is broken after software upgrade. In my case the Internet Gateway Serial # is loss or un-linked in their Server. \"This software no longer works\" My problem is at there engineering level for 3 week now. Still no fix as of yet!. Today I told LiftMaster support if they can not fixit then they should go back to older load of software or send a new Gateway out. Today I got a call from LiftMaster they are sending a new Gateway out. They said this will fix
reviews.author: Thomas Dawe

reviews.title: Love the New Look but NOT Dependable!
reviews.comment: I love the new look and new features.  However, 9 times out of 10 it says \"Cannot operate the door at this time\".  PLEASE take a look at this and get it fixed. I cannot rely on this app when away from home as I am not sure if it will work.  Using Motorola Razr Maxx.  UPDATE: The app is crashing every time I open it.  Then it takes a long time to load then when i finally get to where i can operate the doors and clock on it, it says sorry..cannot operate at this time.  Please fix it!!!!  Kyle
reviews.author: Kyle Wease

reviews.title: Could be designed better
reviews.comment: There is a bit of lag in opening the app and having it connect to find your devices and then it\'s a few seconds after you hit the button to actually open the garage.  I love that I can set a push alert if my garage is open for x amount of minutes.  For those that complain about passwords there is a setting in the app where you can turn off the password check.  I would like to see a widget or a shortcut so that I can add a device to my home screen and just tap to open without having to go through the app.  Tasker/NFC integration would bring this up to 5 stars!!!
reviews.author: Marty Schmidt

reviews.title: On HTC EVO 4G LTE
reviews.comment: Ok, they fixed the following problem works great now:  So far, since the upgrade, I think it is well below my expectations. I want the old one back it worked instantaneously. Now I have to wait forever for it to do anything I am NOT happy.
reviews.author: Thomas Michael Sondergaard

reviews.title: Installed & works fine BUT...
reviews.comment: No ability to flip phone to landscape? Weird!  Running on an S4.
reviews.author: Randall VanEssen

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: I don\'t have much issue with the app. It is not the fastest app and response time is slow (more likely it\'s their server issue than the app). What I don\'t like is how often their service is down. This is the second time in 2 weeks that I can\'t use the app nor their site to control my gate. Now I\'m probably going to purchase another remote.
reviews.author: Andy Cheng

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: This app is consistent at one thing: disappoint you every time you try to use it
reviews.author: Edison Rincon

reviews.title: Getting there..
reviews.comment: Had to take away 1 star.  Notifications can be hours late.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New update is better, but still slow
reviews.comment: When I open the app now, it loads fairly quickly and none of my lights are greyed out anymore. However, it still takes over 30 seconds to turn on a light after I press it, then another minute for the app to update and show that the light is on. If they fix this and allow a list view instead of having to scroll through huge icons (like the mobile site), I\'d give it 5 stars. The mobile site is still faster - even with having to log in every time...
reviews.author: Adam Emmons

reviews.title: Update getting better
reviews.comment: Good to see updates being pushed, much faster than before. No more greyed out door however still asks me to login every now and again which is annoying. Would like to see initial app loading time improved and cloud status time improved. Getting better though, could be a 5 star app soon 4 for now up from 1 HTC One
reviews.author: Harvey Specter

reviews.title: Finally Getting Respect
reviews.comment: Originally it was a 3 star app. Then it became a 1 star app and now it is a 4 star app. No more delays on open/close. So thank you. We still have the annoying bug where it will ask you to log back in instead of for your pin. So you still have to force close it to get it to really work.   Menu button doesn\'t work on Nexus 10 tablet.   PS - I don\'t care much for the \"Liftmaster\" words plastered on the garage door graphic.  I liked the cleaner less tacky look before where it wasn\'t there as it actually looked like my garage door with just the little windows.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update is so much better!
reviews.comment: The speed is much better now, but the \"have to login if you haven\'t in a few hours\" bug is back. Please take a look at that. I\'m using a Galaxy Note 2. The previous version, which was terrible slow didn\'t have that problem, but the version before did. Now it\'s back. Did you roll back to a previous version or something?
reviews.author: Greg Widener
